column4: i'm having trouble getting multiple sites working with apache2. i have two sites i want to serve from the same box/same IP, psychedeli.ca and mahoganytales.com. the problem is, both domains are pointing to the site for psychedeli.ca instead of their own respective sites.

psychedeli.ca is apache2's default domain because it's the vhost that's loaded first. i know for a fact that NameVirtualHost *:80 is being set before these included configs in sites-enabled/ are being loaded into apache2.conf
(did you guys see my second message?)
